input: scene: living room description: A man is sitting on his couch watching TV. A cat is looking in the window. uncanny: The cat in the window is a giant cat. entities: Beer, Cat. caption: Sorry about your garage. We're having him declawed tomorrow.
target: People often declaw their cats to make them less good at scratching: this person's cat is enormous and destroyed a garage. It's funny for two reasons: 1) it's not clear that declawing a giant cat would have saved the garage, so the remedy isn't meaningful; and 2) the man is very nonchalant about his pet wreaking havoc in his neighborhood.
caption_choices: Sorry about your garage. We're having him declawed tomorrow.
generated_idefics: Description - A man is watching TV while a cat sits on the couch. Tomfoolery - A play on the phrase "cat's pajamas." Hilarious caption -You're not the only one who likes to stay in bed all day.<end_of_utterance>
generated_llama2:
Description -  A man is sitting on his couch watching TV. A cat is looking in the window. uncanny: The cat in the window is a giant cat. entities: Beer, Cat. 
Tomfoolery - A play on the idea of a cat burglar. The cat is not stealing anything, but it's a giant cat, which is unusual.
Hilarious caption - I knew I should have boarded up that window!<end_of_utterance></s><unk><unk><unk><unk><unk><unk><unk><unk><unk><unk><unk><unk><unk><unk><unk><unk><unk><unk><unk><unk><unk><unk><unk><unk><unk><unk><unk>

input: scene: an office room description: Three men have another man tied up in a room. His feet are in buckets. uncanny: Nothing is really out of place. entities: Cement_shoes, Kidnapping. caption: It's sloppy work like that that gives the mob a bad name.
target: The reason why the mob has a bad name is because they commit crimes and extort local businesses. But here, the mob boss humorously claims that their poor reputation is due to their "sloppy work", which in this case, is a relatively benign aesthetic concern about using different sized buckets for the cement shoes they are using to kill this person.
caption_choices: It's sloppy work like that that gives the mob a bad name.
generated_idefics:
Description -  Three men are sitting in chairs in a doctor's office. Two of the men are wearing hospital gowns.
Tomfoolery - A play on words: the men are in a doctor's office, but they are not sick. They are there for a different reason.
Hilarious caption - We're not sick, we're just here for a checkup.<end_of_utterance>
generated_llama2:
Description -  Three men have another man tied up in a room. His feet are in buckets. uncanny: Nothing is really out of place. entities: Cement_shoes, Kidnapping. 
Tomfoolery - A play on words: "cement shoes" is a mob term for tying someone's feet in concrete and throwing them in a body of water.
Hilarious caption - I'm sorry, but we can't accept returns on these shoes.<end_of_utterance></s><unk><unk><unk><unk><unk><unk><unk><unk><unk><unk><unk><unk><unk><unk><unk><unk><unk><unk><unk><unk><unk>

input: scene: a field description: Two lions are talking in a field. There is a bunch of doctor's instruments strewn on the ground. uncanny: A doctor's instruments are randomly in the Serengeti. entities: Man-eater, Physician, Predation. caption: If he wasn't an internist he is now.
target: A play on the word "internal" --- an "internist" is a "doctor of internal medicine;" because the lion has eaten the doctor, he is internal to the lion's stomach. So, if he wasn't an "internal" medicine doctor before being eaten, he's "internal" now.
caption_choices: If he wasn't an internist he is now.
generated_idefics:
Description -  A lion and a lioness are eating a mouse.
Tomfoolery - A play on words: the lions are eating a "mouse" instead of a "lion"
Hilarious caption -The lions were so hungry, they ate a mouse.<end_of_utterance>
generated_llama2:
Description -  Two lions are talking in a field. There is a bunch of doctor's instruments strewn on the ground. uncanny: A doctor's instruments are randomly in the Serengeti. entities: Man-eater, Physician, Predation. 
Tomfoolery - A play on words: "Man-eater" is a term for a lion that has a taste for human flesh, but here, the lion is a "physician" who is preying on the doctor's instruments.
Hilarious caption - I'm sorry, but I can't treat you until I find my stethoscope.<end_of_utterance></s>

input: scene: sea description: People are in a boat paddling. A huge wave with a scary face and arms tries to get them. The Statue of Liberty is in the background. uncanny: The waves have a face and arms. entities: Rowing, Immigration, Wind_wave. caption: Row v. Wave.
target: A play on "Row v. Wade", a supreme court case which established a woman's right to access abortions. Here, the wave looks like Donald Trump, a conservative politician who is attempting to overturn row v. wade so women can't legally access abortions. And, the public in the boat who support a woman's right to choose are literally rowing a boat against the wave. So both "Row" and "Wave" have double meanings.
generated_idefics:
Description - A man is on a raft in the middle of the ocean, with a large wave coming towards him.
Tomfoolery - A play on words: Noah's Ark is a well-known story of a man saving animals from a flood. Here, the man is trying to save himself
Hilarious caption -Noah, are you sure this is a good idea?<end_of_utterance>
generated_llama2:
Description -  People are in a boat paddling. A huge wave with a scary face and arms tries to get them. The Statue of Liberty is in the background. uncanny: The waves have a face and arms. entities: Rowing, Immigration, Wind_wave. 
Tomfoolery - A play on the idea of the Statue of Liberty being a symbol of hope and freedom, while the wave represents the dangers and challenges that immigrants face.
Hilarious caption - "Welcome to America, where even the waves want to eat you!"<end_of_utterance></s><unk><unk><unk><unk><unk><unk><unk><unk><unk><unk><unk><unk><unk><unk><unk><unk><unk><unk>

input: scene: a morgue description: There is a man at a desk writing something down. Another man is laying behind him in a coffin. uncanny: A dead man would be out of place unless this is a mortuary. entities: Coffin, Wake_(ceremony). caption: Any stiffness?
target: A joke about rigor mortis --- doctors will ask people about their symptoms during a checkup, e.g., stiffness in various parts of their body. But here, the doctor's patient is already dead, and when people die, their bodies become stiff in a process called rigor mortis. So, while the person is experiencing stiffness, the doctor weirdly doesn't realize that he's dead, which is absurd/funny.
generated_idefics:
Description - A man is lying down in a doctor's office while a doctor looks at him.
Tomfoolery - A play on words: the doctor is looking at the man's x-ray, which shows his skeleton.
Hilarious caption - I'm sorry, sir, but your bones are showing.<end_of_utterance>
generated_llama2:
Description -  There is a man at a desk writing something down. Another man is laying behind him in a coffin. uncanny: A dead man would be out of place unless this is a mortuary. entities: Coffin, Wake_(ceremony). 
Tomfoolery - A play on words: "Wake" can be a noun meaning a gathering after a funeral, or a verb meaning to become aware or conscious.
Hilarious caption - I'm sorry, but I can't attend the wake. I have a prior engagement.<end_of_utterance></s><unk><unk><unk><unk><unk><unk><unk><unk><unk><unk><unk><unk><unk><unk><unk>
